WITH BASE AS( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY B.REGNT_DTM DESC) RNUM, B.*, (SELECT COUNT(*)FROM BOARD_LIKE WHERE 1=1 AND LIKE_SEQ_NO = B.SEQ_NO) LIKE_CNT2 FROM BOARD B WHERE 1=1
AND TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchText}|| '%'
AND CONTENTS LIKE '%' || #{searchText}|| '%'
AND (TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchText}|| '%' OR CONTENTS LIKE '%' || #{searchText}|| '%')
AND TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%' AND BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType} )
SELECT SEARCHLIST.* FROM ( SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BASE) totalCnt, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BASE) - BASE.RNUM + 1 AS NO, BASE.* FROM BASE ) SEARCHLIST WHERE 1=1 AND ( SEARCHLIST.RNUM >= (TO_NUMBER(#{pageSize})*(TO_NUMBER(#{pageNo})-1)+1) AND SEARCHLIST.RNUM <= (TO_NUMBER(#{pageSize})*TO_NUMBER(#{pageNo})) )
